publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-608 Ross Finnie: The Mink Keeping (Scotland) Order 2003 (SSI 2003/528)-That the Environment and Rural Development Committee recommends that the Mink Keeping (Scotland) Order 2003 (SSI 2003/528) be approved. Supported by: Allan Wilson*
